mapper.select: SELECT mem.id as userid, pw as userpw, enabled, authority FROM RHY_MEM mem LEFT OUTER JOIN AUTHORITIES auth on mem.id = auth.id WHERE mem.id = #{userid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RHY_MEM_P(ID, NAME, POSTCODE, ADDRESS, DETAILADDRESS, PHONE, EMAIL, GENDER, BIRTH, COUNT) VALUES(#{userid}, #{username}, #{postcode}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{phone}, #{useremail}, #{usergender}, #{userbirth}, #{count})

INSERT INTO RHY_MEM_C(ID, C_NAME, C_NUM, P_NAME, C_COND, C_TYPE, IC_NAME, IC_PHONE, IC_EMAIL, C_POSTCODE, C_ADDRESS, C_DETAILADDRESS, S_POSTCODE, S_ADDRESS, S_DETAILADDRESS, R_POSTCODE, R_ADDRESS, R_DETAILADDRESS ) VALUES(#{id}, #{c_name}, #{c_num}, #{p_name}, #{c_cond}, #{c_type}, #{ic_name}, #{ic_phone}, #{ic_email}, #{c_postcode}, #{c_address}, #{c_detailaddress}, #{s_postcode}, #{s_address}, #{s_detailaddress}, #{r_postcode}, #{r_address}, #{r_detailaddress})
